channel.title: What would you want from a cheat client? (508)
channel.description:
I'm just wondering what people would want/expect from a 508 cheat client.
Obviously free noclip, but what else?

item.title: What would you want from a cheat client? (508)
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:343605”][quote author=Natey link=topic=439997.msg3233319#msg3233319 date=1276272066]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=439997.msg3233317#msg3233317 date=1276271863]

[quote author=Natey link=topic=439997.msg3233315#msg3233315 date=1276271745]
item spawning, object spawning, etc.
[/quote]You realize that with those you will be the only one that can see them?

But for items, I could make it drop the item on the ground, and as long as the server doesn’t have a dropped item checker, once you pick it up it will give you the item.
[/quote]which most do since they are pali based, if I’m not mistake.
[/quote]Yes, you were a mistake.

But srsly, yeah. Private Servers have a lot more things to prevent cheat clients now.[/quote]Well, unless you have a shitty deltascape leech…

Read full topic
item.source: What would you want from a cheat client? (508)

item.title: What would you want from a cheat client? (508)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:4, topic:343605”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=439997.msg3233317#msg3233317 date=1276271863]

[quote author=Natey link=topic=439997.msg3233315#msg3233315 date=1276271745]
item spawning, object spawning, etc.
[/quote]You realize that with those you will be the only one that can see them?

But for items, I could make it drop the item on the ground, and as long as the server doesn’t have a dropped item checker, once you pick it up it will give you the item.
[/quote]which most do since they are pali based, if I’m not mistake.[/quote]Yes, you were a mistake.

But srsly, yeah. Private Servers have a lot more things to prevent cheat clients now.

Read full topic
